sections.text: Shipwrecks along the Iron Coast whisper of a bell that can call lost sailors home.

options.description: Search the wrecks at low tide.
Interview old sailors at the tavern for clues.

sections.text: Among the wreckage you find a rusted bell half-buried in sand.

options.description: Polish the bell and ring it.
Take the bell to the lighthouse keeper for study.

sections.text: Sailors tell tales of a bell that answers only to those with true loss in their hearts.

options.description: Reflect on your own losses and return to the wreck.
Decide the bell is superstition and move on.

sections.text: The bell's ring echoes across the sea. A ghostly ship appears and a grateful crew thanks you.
The keeper studies the bell and discovers it is a relic of an old navigation guild.
You leave the coast with no answers, but the sea keeps its secrets.
